Nama Mata Kuliah:
Pengujian dan Karakterisasi Material
(Materials Testing and Characterizations)

No:
Deskripsi Mata Kuliah (Course Description):
Mata kuliah ini mempelajari tentang pengujian material, baik destructive test
maupun non-destructive test.
Tujuan Pembelajaran (Course Objective):
Mempelajari pengujian material, baik destructive test maupun non-destructive test,
mempelajari konsep pengujian sifat mekanis material, mempelajari prinsip analisis
tegangan eksperimental dengan menggunakan strain gage, mempelajari metode
karakterisasi material untuk identifikasi material.
Materi Pembelajaran (Outline Syllabus):
Pengujian destruktif dan non-destruktif, kurva tegangan vs regangan bahan, sifat
elastis bahan, sifat plastis bahan, penguatan (strengthening), creep bahan
perpatahan pada bahan (fracture), kelelahan bahan (fatigue), keausan bahan,
spektroskopi molecular, spektroskopi massa, kromatografi, analisis termal, analisis
kimia, analisis x-ray, analisis dengan mikroskop (SEM, TEM), analisis permukaan.
Pengukuran tegangan sisa (hole drilling, x-ray diffraction, strain gauge).
Metode Pembelajaran SCL yang dipilih (Methods of Delivery):
Classical (in class), Case-based learning, Project-based learning
Metode Penilaian (Assessment Methods):
Tugas, Quiz, Project, UTS, UAS, Project.
Referensi (Reference):
1) Francesco Canestrari, Gabriele Tebaldi, Hervé Di Benedetto, Laurent
Porot, Manfred N. Partl, Paul Marsac (2018). Testing and Characterization
of Sustainable Innovative Bituminous Materials and Systems: State-of-the-
Art Report of the RILEM Technical Committee 237-SIB. Jerman: Springer
International Publishing.
2) Taşdemir, M. A., Büyüköztürk, O. (2012). Nondestructive Testing of
Materials and Structures. Belanda: Springer Netherlands.
3) C.O. Ruud, K.J. Kozaczek, Robert E. Green (2012). Nondestructive
Characterization of Materials VI. Amerika Serikat: Springer US.
4) Hosam El-Din M. Saleh, Martin Koller (2019). Characterizations of Some
Composite Materials. Britania Raya: IntechOpen.
5) Bowen Li, Chenguang Bai, Jian Li, Jiann-Yang Hwang, John S. Carpenter,
Juan P. Escobedo-Diaz, Mingming Zhang, Pasquale Russo Spena, Ramasis
Goswami, Sergio Neves Monteiro, Shadia Ikhmayies, Yunus Eren Kalay
(2019). Characterization of Minerals, Metals, and Materials. Germany:
Springer International Publishing.
